## Github Action

ê¸°ë³¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ main ë¸Œëžœì¹˜ì— commitì´ ë˜ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ ë°°í¬ë˜ë„ë¡ ì„¤ì •í•  ìˆ˜ ìžˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

```yml:.github/main.yml
name: GitHub Pages Deploy

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout ðŸ›Žï¸
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Install and Build ðŸ”§
        run: |
          yarn install
          yarn build && touch ./out/.nojekyll

      - name: Deploy ðŸš€
        uses: JamesIves/github-pages-deploy-action@v4
        with:
          branch: gh-pages
          folder: out
```
